    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>The script will copy the value of Match all field to Audience criteria field.</description>
        <name>updateAudienceCriteria</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateAudienceCriteria();
function updateAudienceCriteria(){
 var audienceGR = new GlideRecord('sn_imt_core_safe_workplace_audience');
 audienceGR.query();
 while(audienceGR.next()){
  if(audienceGR.match_all){
    audienceGR.audience_criteria = 'all_criteria';
    audienceGR.update();
  }
 }
}
]]></script>
